description.en: PRivaCY Coin is a privacy blockchain which is secure, scalable and contains the ultimate privacy features. PRCY is a fully anonymous staking coin and payment system. PRCY contains superior privacy technology like Bulletproof, Haprocates Protocol, mandatory stealth addresses and transactions, RingCT & Ring Signatures in a staking chain. With PRCY it is possible to stake, run masternodes and mine PoA blocks.
